column1: Table 3c. Equatorial Guinea: Summary of Central Government Financial Operations, 2015–24
Sources: Data provided by the Equatoguinean authorities; and staff estimates and projections.
Includes social benefits and other transfers.
Includes a one-time clearance of outstanding arrears through securitization in 2020.
Statutory advances are assumed to be repayed in 10 years, starting in 2022. Includes amortization of advances in 2022-23, and payment of arrears in 2020-24.
Includes exceptional repayment of foreign debt for 2015.
Equal to the overall balance minus interest and hydrocarbon revenues.
It does not include deposits with commercial banks that are not available.
